items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Bring your arms behind your back and clasp your hands together.
Slowly lift your arms up and away from your body, keeping them straight.
Hold the stretch for 10-15 seconds, feeling the stretch in your chest and shoulders.
Release the stretch and repeat as desired.
Improves posture by opening up the chest and shoulders
Relieves tension and tightness in the chest and upper back muscles
Increases flexibility and range of motion in the shoulders
Helps to prevent shoulder and neck injuries
Can be done anywhere without any equipment
